The Samaya Seminyak Set on a spectacular beachfront location, The Samaya Seminyak provides a quiet oasis but is still close enough to enjoy the many restaurants, bars and entertainment of lively Seminyak. Beautiful villas offer space and elegant accommodation in a tranquil setting. The main resort on the beachside is a great place for dinner by the beach or a sunset cocktail. One Bedroom Pool Villa (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 9 Nov - 26 Dec 25 & 4 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Twin per person fr $2,404 Extra Nights fr $579 per person Note: ^Free nights are already included in the advertised price and no further discount applies *Must advise guests are honeymooners at the time of booking. Includes 5 nights at The Samaya Seminyak - Daily A'la carte breakfast served at any restaurant including in the villa and at any time or anywhere - Main pool and beachside free flow iced mineral water and one time refreshment a day - Complimentary shuttle service within Seminyak perimeter area - Complimentary Wi-Fi internet connection throughout the resort - 24/7 Butler Services - Samaya creative welcome arrival experience. Return private transfers from Denpasar airport to hotel Bonus ^1 FREE night (blackout dates 27 Dec 25 to 03 Jan 26) - complimentary daily Afternoon Tea and 1x 60 min Balinese massage for 2 persons per villa - PLUS *Honeymooners receive a cake upon arrival, flower decorated room upon arrival, flower bath upon arrival, and complimentary souvenir of The Samaya Bali for honeymoon guests. Per Person, from $2,404 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Payment & ticketing deadline - no more than 7 days after reservation confirmation. Valid for sales to 30 Nov 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 15 Oct 2025 to 31 Mar 2026 (unless otherwise specified).International flights are not included, please enquire for best available pricing. Please note there is limited availability on the advertised room types and all pricing is subject to change until a reservation is confirmed. Inventory & availability can change on a daily basis. Please note due to airline schedules you may prefer a late checkout on your final day, contact us for details. Please note also that Saturday 19 March 26 is Nyepi Day (or Silence Day) in Bali and no check in or check out will be available on this day. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 02 Oct 25.
